name: anc2l
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(w0, wi(w1, wa(w0, w2))))

stmt.origin: biimpi(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(w0, wi(w1, wa(w0, w2))))

|- wi(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(w0, wi(w1, wa(w0, w2))))
-| wb(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(w0, wi(w1, wa(w0, w2))))

comment: Conjoin antecedent to left of consequent in nested implication. (Contributed by NM, 10-Aug-1994.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 14-Jul-2013.)
